en: It is a good thing to give thanks unto Jehovah, And to sing praises unto thy name, O Most High;
hmr: LALPA kuoma lâwmthu hril le, Aw Achunghnungtak, i hming inpâkna hla sak hi thil ṭhatak a nih;

en: To show forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, And thy faithfulness every night,
hmr: Zîngkâra i zainêmna suklang le, Zân tina i ringumna suklang hi,

en: With an instrument of ten strings, and with the psaltery; With a solemn sound upon the harp.
hmr: Thil sutthei hrui sâwm nei mi le, perkhuonghai, Ṭingṭang ri mi lungriem inthlâktir thei dâma suklang hi.

en: For thou, Jehovah, hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.
hmr: LALPA, nang chun i sinthawin i mi suklâwm sih a. I kut thilthawhai leiin hlimin hla sak ka tih.

en: How great are thy works, O Jehovah! Thy thoughts are very deep.
hmr: Aw LALPA, i thilthawhai chu a va ropui de! I ngaituonahai chu ân thûk êm êm a nih.

en: A brutish man knoweth not; Neither doth a fool understand this:
hmr: Mi mâwl chun hi hi a hriet nawh a; Mi invêtin a hrietthiem bawk nawh:

en: When the wicked spring as the grass, And when all the workers of iniquity do flourish; It is that they shall be destroyed for ever.
hmr: Mi rilohai hlobet anga an hung inder a, Thil suksuoltuhai po po an hung inno hlut hlut hin, Kumkhuoa dinga sukbo- hmangin an um ding a hung ni hlak, ti hi.

en: But thou, O Jehovah, art on high for evermore.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nang ruok chu kumkhuoa dinga insângtaka um zing i nih.

en: For, lo, thine enemies, O Jehovah, For, lo, thine enemies shall perish; All the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
hmr: Aw LALPA, ngai ta, nangma dotuhai hi, Ngai ta, nangma dotuhai hi an bohmang ding a nih; Thil suksuoltuhai po po hi sukdarin an um vawng ding a nih.

en: But my horn hast thou exalted like the horn of the wild-ox: I am anointed with fresh oil.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ka ki hi ramsiel ki angin i chawimawi a, Hriek thara nâl ka ni tah.

en: Mine eye also hath seen my desire on mine enemies, Mine ears have heard my desire of the evil-doers that rise up against me.
hmr: Ka mitin ka hmêlmahai chunga ka duthusâm tlung chu a hmu tah, Ka na hin thil ṭha naw thawtu, a mi hung thawtuhai chunga ka duthusâm tlung ri chu a hriet tah.

en: The righteous shall flourish like the palm-tree: He shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.
hmr: Mi fel chu intûm angin inno hlut hlut a ta, Lebanon tlânga sidar thing angin inṭhang duok duok a tih.

en: They are planted in the house of Jehovah; They shall flourish in the courts of our God.
hmr: LALPA ina phunhai chu, Ei Pathien biekin inhuonna tuol sûnga chun inno hlut hlut an tih.

en: They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; They shall be full of sap and green:
hmr: Tar hnung khawma la ra rawp an ta, Tuihnâng pâi ṭeuin hring hlut hlut an tih.

en: To show that Jehovah is upright; He is my rock, and there is no unrighteousness in him.
hmr: LALPA chu mi indiktak a nih ti inlangtirna dingin, Ama chu ka lungpui a nih, amaa chun fel nawna hrim hrim a um nawh.
